title: A Boy, a dog and a frog
creator_credit: Evergreen Films, John Sturner and Gary Templeton
brief_description: This film follows the adventures of a small boy and his dog as they spend a day trying to capture a playful frog at a nearby pond. The film is a delightful, non-verbal production that will provide amusement and enjoyment for audiences of all ages.
